column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Solid food. We came in on a Thursday morning and the service was fast and we got two skillet and an order of buttermilk pancakes. Everything was amazing and delicious. Also really like the wide variety of food because my brother is gluten free and they had plenty of options for him
column2: and those were also delicious. I would definitely recommend going here but it's really busy on the weekend
column3: so I would recommend going weekday mornings for breakfast or brunch.
